title: Pond Adventures with Chippy
description: This fun children's book was inspired by true events. Follow Chippy, the chipmunk, and his friends, Allie, Jasmine, Luther and Mister Big, as they help each other and experience a day of adventure near the pond. Includes fun facts about chipmunks. The colorful, original oil and computer images from Scottish artist, John Morris, help bring Chippy and his friends to life.
author: Cindy Freland
